Q & A:

1）
Q: 玩單板snowboard定雙板ski好
A: 你鍾意啦，玩得勁兩個都型

2）
Q: 新手黎緊第一次滑，有咩要注意同準備？
A: 單板既話，一定要護膝同pad 褲，學同玩既過程，跌同跪係一定會有，慳錢唔買=睇醫生嘔返出黎

3）
Q: 請唔請滑雪教練好？
A: 請教練學好基本功會少行好多冤枉路


裝備資訊（From 大舊魚）
首先要決定滑單板定雙板
會決定你需唔需要買pad褲(單板要, 雙板唔洗)
如果會去東京御茶之水/小川町運動鋪街果邊買,
就可以順便執埋套gear

買既次序我覺得係先買貼面貼身果d,
最外層反而有得租可以租住先
因為貼身野未必個個場有得租, 有都衛生極有限

貼面貼身去到最外層, 我覺得買既次序應該係咁:
(1)面罩/圍頸(一個圈果種, 非頸巾)/balaclava(包晒成個頭會暖d, 但怕熱者勿用)
(2)雪鏡
(3)最plain果種唔會最頂有粒波既果種冷帽
(如果租頭盔可以用佢隔一隔)/直接買頭盔
(4) 排汗既最底層(上身tee同下身legging)
(snowboard者有同冇會極大分別-5)padded褲(護pat同膝); ski未必需要
(6)最外層(要防水但透氣), 即係雪衣同雪褲
(7)鞋
(8)binding同板 (ski: 仲有pole)
(9)中層, 我自己求其一件抓毛衛衣就算,
有d靚既有埋防水果d會更好

每一項都可以再講深入d,
例如咩design, 品牌, 物料都有好多野可以再share
遲D去志賀滑,上年係奧日光有搵教練學左半日SKI,自己又玩左日,不過都成年前既事,叫做學識左用S形方法落山
剛從野澤回來

replies.msg:
分分鐘陸續有黎
香港起個室內場就好

I'm making preparations for my ski trip to Hokkaido. I'm also making preparations to meet my favourite band X JAPAN in Hiroshima so I'm preoccupied with these preparations. Preparations are being made for next week's ski festival in Hokkaido. The organisations who organise it have announced that preparations for the ski festival are well under way. I highly recommend that you stay in Fuji High Hotel. The restaurant in it has an unusual menu. It offers a breakfast buffet and a three-course set menu. If also offers a lunch buffet and a choice of menu (a menu of four courses) For supper there are a buffet supper and three set menus of four courses. I chose beef served with onions from the menu while my cousin ordered a chicken dish from the menu. The inside of the beef is raw whereas the outside is cooked. Onions can be eaten raw or cooked. Its cafe also has an excellent menu. I have a dinner reservation for three people at the cafe at ten to eight next Monday. X Japan used to give regular concerts which won widespread critical acclaim in the press including Japan today, the Japan news, Japan times online and various cultural websites. Their songs "Rusty Nail" and "Endless Rain" have attracted great international acclaim in the media over the years including Oriental daily, southern daily, Hong Kong economic journal, South China morning post and various cultural websites. Their concert tour of Asia so far has been greeted with great critical acclaim by the media. By the way a single-decker bus with passengers in it along with the cars behind it are held up in Lyndhurst Terrace because a truck is parked in the middle of the road delivering orchids and sunflowers to the florist's but the lorry driver has disappeared. Nobody knows where he's gone. The single-deck bus and the cars behind it have been blowing their horns along the way which is a bit funny. Fifteen minutes later the truck driver has finally returned and the traffic is flowing again. This morning there was a lot of traffic on Queens Road Central. Normally traffic is quite light in this road but someone it was unusually heavy this morning. The driver beside me kept sounding her horn. Nonetheless I'm going to leave home early next time hoping to miss the traffic. Normally there isn't much traffic after midnight, if not no traffic but yesterday night my friend was stuck in traffic on the road. I too suggested that next time he leave home early so as to avoid the traffic.
